categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi

nodes.text: Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi
Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi is a series of books and comics related to the film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.

The Moviemaking Magic of Star Wars: Creatures & Aliens was originally supposed to release as part of this program, however, it was delayed and was subsequently released on May 25, 2018, to coincide with the release of Solo: A Star Wars Story, after Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi was over.
The Star Wars Adventures comics series was also originally solicited to be begin as a part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi, but that idea was later dropped.
